person.persName: Curran Pope (Louisville, KY, Colonel of the 5th Kentucky Infantry)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, soldier. Louisville native. Son of Worden Pope and Elizabeth Taylor Thruston Pope. Married Matilda Prather Jacob Pope. Father of John J. Pope, Patrick H. Pope, and Mary Tyler Pope. Graduate of the United States Military Academy at West Point in 1834. Served in the United States Artillery as a second lieutenant in 1834. Assistant engineer on the Kentucky River and Cumberland River in 1835. Clerk of the Jefferson County Court in Jefferson County for seventeen years. Served in the Fifth Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a colonel until November 5, 1862.
